text: 2:17 2 Korin 1:12; 4:2; 11:13; 1 Pita 4:11; 2 Pita 2:3Ezɨ e gumazamizir mabar mɨn amir puvatɨ, me danganiba bar dagh aruava Godɨn akam mɨgɨa, mati me dagɨaba bagha biziba amadi. God uabɨ ingangarir kam e ganɨngizɨ e ifarir puvatɨ, e guizbangɨra mɨgei. E Krais ko porogha, Godɨn damazimɨn deravɨram an akaba akuri.
